definition: great family/rich family/large landlord/conspicuous spender or consumer
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to plunder the homes of the wealthy for food (in times of famine)/(of sb who has no income) to rely on others/to demand a "contribution" or "loan" from a business or wealthy individual

sentences.english: Woman is the daughter of rich family, literature, everything terrible.
sentences.chinese: 女人是大户人家的女儿，琴棋书画样样了得。

sentences.english: To reduce memory usage, start by identifying the largest consumers of memory.
sentences.chinese: 为了减少内存消耗，先要找出内存的消耗大户。

sentences.english: Hummer made GM seem like the gas-guzzler company.
sentences.chinese: 悍马让通用汽车看起来像是一家耗油大户。

sentences.english: Sieghart says the mosques are heavy users of water.
sentences.chinese: Sieghart说这些清真寺是用水大户。

sentences.english: SALCO is a big consumer of energy, and it is also a big steam consumer.
sentences.chinese: 山东铝业公司是能源消耗大户，也是蒸汽耗用大户。

sentences.english: SALCO is a big consumer of energy, and it is also a big steam consumer.
sentences.chinese: 山东铝业公司是能源消耗大户，也是蒸汽耗用大户。

sentences.english: The textile, printing and dyeing industry discharges majority of industrial wastewater.
sentences.chinese: 纺织印染行业是工业废水排放大户。

sentences.english: However, nowadays the villa shows few signs of a family of distinction.
sentences.chinese: 但是如今的东园别墅，却难以再见大户人家的风范。

sentences.english: But now we have moved to a new apartment, large-sized apartment.
sentences.chinese: 但现在我们搬到了一个新的公寓，大户型。

sentences.english: As a user of energy consumption, housing industry accounts for a great proportion of energy utilization.
sentences.chinese: 住宅产业作为耗能大户，在能源使用中占很大的比例。

sentences.english: Companies or large pig and chicken fry and egg production base.
sentences.chinese: 公司还是养猪大户及鸡苗种和鸡蛋生产基地。

sentences.english: It was the first time he had mentioned the house from which she came.
sentences.chinese: 他这是第一次提到她走出来的那个大户人家。

sentences.english: King County Gang green pepper cultivation is large.
sentences.chinese: 李刚是金阳县青花椒种植大户。

sentences.english: Asia is an exporter and saver, of which the best example is China.
sentences.chinese: 亚洲以中国为典型，是出口商也是储蓄大户。

sentences.english: The “Godfather” is a story about the powerful mafia families in New York.
sentences.chinese: 电影《教父》就是有关纽约黑手党的豪门大户的故事。

sentences.english: There lives a big family in a village.
sentences.chinese: 村里住着一个大户人家。

definition: rich and powerful/rich and influential person/big shot
